Test Name: HEREDITARY HEMOLYTIC ANEMIA GENE PANEL (Next-Generation Sequencing)
Purpose: To detect genetic variants associated with hereditary hemolytic anemia using next-generation sequencing, ensuring consistent, accurate, and reproducible diagnostic results.
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, Qubit or NanoDrop, Bioanalyzer, and a next-generation sequencing system (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent)
